server.description: Add or remove server to server group

ping.description: Specify ping checking attributes. Only one set is allowed

server_ip.description: IP address of RFC 3576 RADIUS server

WindowDuration.description: Number in seconds. Range: 1-600 secs. Default: 300 secs.

source.description: Name of RFC 3576 Server to copy

cond-expr.description: The regex pattern that uniquely identifies the syslog

user-expr.description: The regex pattern that uniquely identifies the user

nrole.description: The role to move user to

host.description: IP address/hostname of CPPM IF-MAP Server

portnum.description: Port number of CPPM IF-MAP Server (1 ~ 65535)

username.description: The username in CPPM IF-MAP Server (1 ~ 255 bytes in length)

passwd.description: The password of the username in CPPM IF-MAP Server (6 ~ 100 bytes in length)

profile.description: Currently active Palo Alto Networks Profile

username.description: The username of the user who can perform actions on Server (length of 1 ~ 255 bytes)

passwd.description: The password of the user who can perform actions on Server (length of 6 ~ 100 bytes)

username.description: The username of the user who can perform actions on Server (length of 1 ~ 255 bytes)

passwd.description: The password of the user who can perform actions on Server (length of 6 ~ 100 bytes)

frequency_inst.description: Specify ping frequency in seconds (1-65535), default 5

timeout_inst.description: Specify ping timeout in seconds (1-65535), default 2

server_id.description: IP address of XML API server

default-authenticated-role.description: Assign default role for users after XML server authorization

source.description: Name of XML API Server to copy

trusted-ip-addr_inst.description: Specify server IP Address on trusted network

untrusted-ip-addr_inst.description: Specify server IP Address on untrusted network

host.description: IP address/hostname of Palo Alto Networks Firewall

portnum.description: Port number of Palo Alto Networks Firewall (1 ~ 65535)

username.description: The username in Palo Alto Networks Firewall (1 ~ 255 bytes in length)

passwd.description: The password of the username in Palo Alto Networks Firewall (6 ~ 100 bytes in length)

source.description: Name of Palo Alto Networks Servers Profile to copy
